proof.args: real_abs_neg, abs (-x) ^ n = abs x ^ n
proof.th: ⊢ abs (-x) ^ n = abs x ^ n

proof.args: real_abs_pow, abs (-x ^ n) = abs x ^ n
proof.th: ⊢ abs (-x ^ n) = abs x ^ n
⊢ abs (-x ^ n) = abs x ^ n
⊢ abs (1::real) = 1
⊢ abs ((1::real) ^ n) = 1
⊢ abs (1::real) ^ n = 1
⊢ abs (-(1::real) ^ n) = 1

content.name: real_infsum_offset

proof.th: real_summable (from m) f ⊢ real_summable (from m) f
m ≤ k ⊢ m ≤ k
real_summable (from m) f ⊢ real_summable (from (k + 1)) f
real_summable (from m) f ⊢ ∃l. real_sums f l (from m)
⊢ _VAR l
real_sums f l (from m) ⊢ real_sums f l (from m)
real_sums f l (from m) ⊢ m < k + 1 ⟶ real_sums f (l - sum ({m..k + 1 - 1}) f) (from (k + 1))
real_sums f l (from m) ⊢ m < k + 1 ⟶ real_sums f (l - sum ({m..k}) f) (from (k + 1))
m ≤ k ⊢ m < k + 1
m ≤ k, real_sums f l (from m) ⊢ real_sums f (l - sum ({m..k}) f) (from (k + 1))
m ≤ k, real_sums f l (from m) ⊢ real_infsum (from (k + 1)) f = l - sum ({m..k}) f
⊢ sum ({m..k}) f + (l - sum ({m..k}) f) = l

proof.args: real_sums f (sum ({m..k}) f + (l - sum ({m..k}) f)) (from m)
proof.th: m ≤ k, real_summable (from m) f, real_sums f l (from m) ⊢ real_sums f (sum ({m..k}) f + (l - sum ({m..k}) f)) (from m)

proof.args: real_sums f (sum ({m..k}) f + real_infsum (from (k + 1)) f) (from m)
proof.th: m ≤ k, real_summable (from m) f, real_sums f l (from m) ⊢ real_sums f (sum ({m..k}) f + real_infsum (from (k + 1)) f) (from m)
m ≤ k, real_summable (from m) f, real_sums f l (from m) ⊢ real_infsum (from m) f = sum ({m..k}) f + real_infsum (from (k + 1)) f
⊢ real_summable (from m) f ⟶ m ≤ k ⟶ real_infsum (from m) f = sum ({m..k}) f + real_infsum (from (k + 1)) f

prop: real_summable (from m) f
⟶ m ≤ k ⟶ real_infsum (from m) f = sum ({m..k}) f + real_infsum (from (k + 1)) f

content.name: real_infsum_offset_alt

proof.th: real_summable (from m) f ⊢ real_summable (from m) f
m < k ⊢ m < k
m < k ⊢ m ≤ k - 1
m < k, real_summable (from m) f ⊢ real_infsum (from m) f = sum ({m..k - 1}) f + real_infsum (from (k - 1 + 1)) f
m < k ⊢ 1 ≤ k
m < k, real_summable (from m) f ⊢ k - 1 + 1 = k
m < k, real_summable (from m) f ⊢ real_infsum (from m) f = sum ({m..k - 1}) f + real_infsum (from k) f
⊢ real_summable (from m) f ⟶ m < k ⟶ real_infsum (from m) f = sum ({m..k - 1}) f + real_infsum (from k) f

prop: real_summable (from m) f
⟶ m < k ⟶ real_infsum (from m) f = sum ({m..k - 1}) f + real_infsum (from k) f

abs x < 1 ⊢ abs x < 1

abs x < 1, real_summable (from m) (λi. a i * x ^ i), ∀i. m ≤ i ⟶ abs (a i) ≤ u ⊢ ∀i. m ≤ i ⟶ abs (a i * x ^ i) ≤ u * abs x ^ i
⊢ _VAR i
m ≤ i ⊢ m ≤ i
⊢ 0 ≤ abs x
m ≤ i, abs x < 1, real_summable (from m) (λi. a i * x ^ i), ∀i. m ≤ i ⟶ abs (a i) ≤ u ⊢ 0 ≤ abs x ^ i

proof.th: m ≤ i, abs x < 1, real_summable (from m) (λi. a i * x ^ i), ∀i. m ≤ i ⟶ abs (a i) ≤ u ⊢ abs (a i) * abs (x ^ i) ≤ u * abs x ^ i

proof.th: m ≤ i, abs x < 1, real_summable (from m) (λi. a i * x ^ i), ∀i. m ≤ i ⟶ abs (a i) ≤ u ⊢ abs (a i * x ^ i) ≤ u * abs x ^ i
abs x < 1, real_summable (from m) (λi. a i * x ^ i), ∀i. m ≤ i ⟶ abs (a i) ≤ u ⊢ ∀i. m ≤ i ⟶ abs (a i * x ^ i) ≤ u * abs x ^ i

proof.args: in_from, ∀i. i ∈ from m ⟶ abs (a i * x ^ i) ≤ u * abs x ^ i
proof.th: abs x < 1, real_summable (from m) (λi. a i * x ^ i), ∀i. m ≤ i ⟶ abs (a i) ≤ u ⊢ ∀i. i ∈ from m ⟶ abs (a i * x ^ i) ≤ u * abs x ^ i
abs x < 1, real_summable (from m) (λi. a i * x ^ i), ∀i. m ≤ i ⟶ abs (a i) ≤ u ⊢ abs (real_infsum (from m) (λi. a i * x ^ i)) ≤ u * abs x ^ m / (1 - abs x)

⟶ abs x < 1

content.name: real_sums_simple_bound

proof.args: real_sums (λi. a i * x ^ i) t (from n)
proof.th: real_sums (λi. a i * x ^ i) t (from n) ⊢ real_sums (λi. a i * x ^ i) t (from n)
n < m ⊢ n < m
∀i. m ≤ i ⟶ abs (a i) ≤ u ⊢ ∀i. m ≤ i ⟶ abs (a i) ≤ u
abs x < 1 ⊢ abs x < 1
real_sums (λi. a i * x ^ i) t (from n) ⊢ real_summable (from n) (λi. a i * x ^ i)
real_sums (λi. a i * x ^ i) t (from n) ⊢ real_infsum (from n) (λi. a i * x ^ i) = t
n < m, real_sums (λi. a i * x ^ i) t (from n) ⊢ real_infsum (from n) (λi. a i * x ^ i) = sum ({n..m - 1}) (λi. a i * x ^ i) + real_infsum (from m) (λi. a i * x ^ i)
n < m, real_sums (λi. a i * x ^ i) t (from n) ⊢ t = sum ({n..m - 1}) (λi. a i * x ^ i) + real_infsum (from m) (λi. a i * x ^ i)

proof.args: ∀a::real. ∀b. ∀c. a = b + c ⟶ a - b = c
proof.th: ⊢ ∀a::real. ∀b. ∀c. a = b + c ⟶ a - b = c
n < m, real_sums (λi. a i * x ^ i) t (from n) ⊢ t - sum ({n..m - 1}) (λi. a i * x ^ i) = real_infsum (from m) (λi. a i * x ^ i)
real_sums (λi. a i * x ^ i) t (from n) ⊢ real_summable (from m) (λi. a i * x ^ i)
n < m, abs x < 1, ∀i. m ≤ i ⟶ abs (a i) ≤ u, real_sums (λi. a i * x ^ i) t (from n) ⊢ abs (real_infsum (from m) (λi. a i * x ^ i)) ≤ u * abs x ^ m / (1 - abs x)

proof.args: abs (t - sum ({n..m - 1}) (λi. a i * x ^ i)) ≤ u * abs x ^ m / (1 - abs x)
proof.th: n < m, abs x < 1, ∀i. m ≤ i ⟶ abs (a i) ≤ u, real_sums (λi. a i * x ^ i) t (from n) ⊢ abs (t - sum ({n..m - 1}) (λi. a i * x ^ i)) ≤ u * abs x ^ m / (1 - abs x)
⊢ real_sums (λi. a i * x ^ i) t (from n) ⟶ n < m ⟶ (∀i. m ≤ i ⟶ abs (a i) ≤ u) ⟶ abs x < 1 ⟶ abs (t - sum ({n..m - 1}) (λi. a i * x ^ i)) ≤ u * abs x ^ m / (1 - abs x)

prop: real_sums (λi. a i * x ^ i) t (from n)
⟶ n < m
⟶ (∀i. m ≤ i ⟶ abs (a i) ≤ u)
⟶ abs x < 1
⟶ abs (t - sum ({n..m - 1}) (λi. a i * x ^ i)) ≤ u * abs x ^ m / (1 - abs x)

steps.goal: ∀a::real. ∀b. ∀c. a = b + c ⟶ a - b = c

content.name: abs_sum_lemma_pos

proof.args: abs (a + b) = abs a + abs b
proof.th: 0 ≤ a * b ⊢ abs (a + b) = abs a + abs b
⊢ 0 ≤ a * b ⟶ abs (a + b) = abs a + abs b

content.prop: 0 ≤ a * b ⟶ abs (a + b) = abs a + abs b

content.name: abs_sum_lemma_neg

proof.args: abs (a + b) = abs (abs a - abs b)
proof.th: a * b ≤ 0 ⊢ abs (a + b) = abs (abs a - abs b)
⊢ a * b ≤ 0 ⟶ abs (a + b) = abs (abs a - abs b)

content.prop: a * b ≤ 0 ⟶ abs (a + b) = abs (abs a - abs b)

description: Formal inequalities for trig about series.
name: trig_series
